title: Kisan Kart — Farmer Marketplace MVP

requirements.text: Create the core frontend application structure for “Kisan Kart” with primary navigation and pages: Home, Browse Listings, Create Listing, My Listings, and About/Help.

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: App name “Kisan Kart” is visible in the header and page titles.
Users can navigate between Home, Browse Listings, Create Listing, My Listings, and About/Help without broken links.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Implement a coherent, distinctive visual theme for Kisan Kart (colors, typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across all pages.

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across header, buttons, inputs, cards, and page layouts.
Theme does not rely on blue/purple as the primary brand palette.
UI is readable and usable on both mobile and desktop sizes.

requirements.text: Implement backend data model and APIs to support marketplace listings, including creating, reading, updating, and deleting listings. Each listing must include: id, title, description, category, price (number), unit (text), location (text), images (optional URLs or asset references), owner (principal), createdAt, updatedAt, and status (active/inactive).

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes methods to create a listing, list all active listings, get listing by id, update listing (owner-only), and delete/deactivate listing (owner-only).
Listing ownership is enforced so only the creator can edit/delete their listings.
Timestamps are set/updated appropriately on create/update.

requirements.text: Connect the frontend to the backend APIs to enable end-to-end listing workflows: create listing form submission, browse listings, view listing details, and manage the current user’s listings (edit/deactivate).

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: A user can create a listing from the Create Listing page and see it appear in Browse Listings.
A user can open a listing detail view from Browse Listings.
My Listings shows only listings created by the current user and allows editing/deactivation.
Frontend uses React Query for fetch/mutation flows with loading and error states.

requirements.text: Add browsing utilities on the frontend: search by keyword (title/description), filter by category, and sort by newest and price (low-to-high / high-to-low).

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: Browse Listings supports keyword search, category filtering, and sorting controls.
Controls update the visible results and have an empty-state message when no results match.
State changes do not cause UI crashes and show appropriate loading indicators.

requirements.text: Implement authentication using Internet Identity to identify the listing owner and to gate access to Create Listing and My Listings pages (prompt to sign in when not authenticated).

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users can browse listings but are prompted to sign in for Create Listing and My Listings.
Authenticated principal is used when creating listings and determining ownership in My Listings.
Sign in and sign out actions update the UI state correctly.

requirements.text: Add a listing detail page that includes a “Contact” section showing seller-provided contact text (e.g., phone/WhatsApp text field) stored in the listing, without integrating external messaging APIs.

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: Create/Edit listing includes an optional contact field saved with the listing.
Listing detail page displays the contact field when provided, otherwise hides it or shows 'Not provided'.
No external messaging, SMS, WhatsApp, or chat integration is implemented.

requirements.text: Add basic client-side and backend-side validation for listing creation/editing (required fields, price >= 0, length limits) and display clear inline error messages in English.

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: Required fields prevent submission and show inline error messages.
Backend rejects invalid payloads and returns errors that the UI renders clearly.
Price cannot be negative; overly long text fields are rejected or constrained.

requirements.text: Add seed/sample data support for local development so the Browse Listings page can display a few example listings when running locally (without requiring manual entry every time).

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: There is a way to populate a small set of sample listings for development/testing.
Sample data does not overwrite real user data unintentionally (e.g., only runs in a controlled/dev-only way).

requirements.text: Render generated static brand assets (logo and a simple hero banner) from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the header and Home page.

quotes: Create a app for formers name is kisan kart

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Header uses the logo asset.
Home page includes the hero banner asset and maintains responsive layout.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in the main actor file).

Do not modify files in frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui); compose and use them as-is.
No external databases or third-party auth providers; only Internet Identity for auth.
No real-time features (no WebSockets), and no external messaging integrations.
nonGoals: Order management, delivery tracking, or logistics features.
Admin dashboard and moderation workflows beyond owner-only listing management.
External integrations (WhatsApp API, SMS, email sending, maps/GPS).

required: Simple agricultural marketplace logo mark with text “Kisan Kart”, earthy tones (kisan-kart-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner illustration featuring farmers, crops, and a small marketplace stall in a clean flat style (kisan-kart-hero.dim_1600x600.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text
